transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hanji sir good morning.
Executive: Good morning.
Executive: Roshan baat kar raha hu sir Indiamart office se.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Aapki baat to hui na abhi Akhtar se aapne call kara tha kal sir customer care pe.
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Bataye sir aapki Akhtar se bhi abhi video meeting bhi hui na.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ji bataye sir kya help kar sakte hai aapki aur.
Customer: Lead nahi aa rahi Indiamart pe hamari.
Executive: Sir humne past lead aapko check karaya tha past lead mein aapke pass achi khasi lead hai.
Customer: Sir ab to aai nahi rahi pehle to thi par ab nahi hai na.
Executive: Sir kya baat kar rahe ho aapne to last month by lead consume kari hai wo abhi tak ka sabse jyada by lead consume kara hai abhi tak aapne.
Customer: Hai na total aapne normally aap 70 72 lead consume karte the saal above mahine ka.
Executive: Last month mein aapne 116 by lead consume kari.
Executive: Abhi sir nau dino mein aapne 30 by lead already consume kar liya hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Customer: Par sir is time to lead nahi hai na.
Executive: Sir ab aisa to nahi hota na ki sir roz ek hi jaisa rahega kyuki thode bahut to kabhi kabhi hota hai na ki man lijiye ki market situation kharab raha ya koi bhi cheez to us accordingly lead ka to incoming incoming to us accordingly us pe bhi kafi sara depend karta hai na sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aap khud bataye market sir hamesha ek jaisa to nahi rehta na.
Customer: Wo to hai sir par.
Customer: Ye lead hamare pass brass ki aati hai aur kisi material ki aati hai wo marble ki to aati nahi hai.
Executive: Sir brass ki agar aa rahi hai na to ek bar ko main dekh leta hu aapke pass mein koi marble statue ke alava koi aur keyword aapne update kar rakha hai kya ek second hold kijiyega sab marble Shiva statue black marble Shivling marble Vishwakarma marble Shivling marble Ram Darbar marble marble putta marble ek Parvati statue karke hai isko bhi main hata deta hu marble Parvati statue kar deta hu Shiva statue hai ye already aapne hata diya hai to aapki jo mostly keyword yaha pe updated hai wo sab marble statue ke hi keyword updated hai.
Customer: Fir sir brass ki kaise aa rahi hai brass ki nahi aani chahiye na ye clay ki aani chahiye. [inaudible] main aapko batata hu ki let suppose ki aapke pass mein koi by lead aai ab jaise man lijiye aapke pass mein God statue naam se by lead aai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Yes. Aur niche mein material mein marble likha hua hai.
Customer: Hai na to aapne wo to consume kar liya dekh ke lekin kyuki jo category aapne consume kari category aapke pass mein aai wo category aapki God statue ki thi.
Executive: Right ab kyuki God statue mein na sare tarah ke statues aa jate hai chahe wo grass ke ho chahe marble ke ho chahe iron ke ho kyuki God statue sir apne aap mein ek bahut bada keyword hai.
Customer: Right.
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Is vajah se thodi bahut jo problem aa rahi hogi is vajah se aati hai isiliye to kyuki aapke pass mein jitne bhi keywords ya jitne bhi aate hai na profile aapke aapke pass mein by leads and all.
Executive: Wo sara depend karta hai ki aapke profile mein kaun sa keyword updated hai to keyword to aapka sara marble ka hi matlab marble related hi keyword updated hai.
Executive: To ye kabhi kabhar thoda bahut aata hoga generally ye nahi aata hoga sir.
Customer: Nahi is time to abhi humne do lead delete kari thi aaj ki do lead aai thi brass ki aur kya thi wo to pata nahi niche wali wo do lead.
Executive: Wahi main keh raha hu ki kabhi kabhi thoda bahut problem aata hoga abhi bhi aapke profile mein na jis jis particular product mein ek ek keyword updated hai na un sare mein main marble related do do keyword main kar de raha hu.
Executive: Right taki aapka jo presence hai over the India mart ye thoda aur improve ho.
Customer: Hai na.
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: To abhi hamare pass mein jo filhal jo option hai wo option ye hai ki hum matlab ek to wahi cheez sir jitna jyada aap active reh sakte hai please aap active rahiye jitna jyada aap rahenge utna jyada hamare liye achcha hoga.
Customer: Sir active to aap phone se laptop se dono se rehte hai.
Executive: Bilkul sir main man raha hu ki aap active honge.
Executive: Main bhi main wo nahi keh raha hu main ye keh raha hu ki fir bhi lead nahi aa rahi hamare pass na hi ab India mein aa rahi kuch bhi lead show nahi kar rahi na laptop mein kar rahi abhi na phone mein kar rahi abhi is time to.
Executive: Ek bari sir main past lead mein check karta hu ek second hold kijiye past lead mein sir abhi 13 minute pehle ek marble Khatu Shyam statue ka aaya hua tha 39 minute pehle marble Khatu Shyam ka aaya hua tha 53 minute pehle marble Shivaji Shivji statue ka bhi aaya hua tha ek ghante pehle to aaj aapke pass mein aaj aaj mein sir nahi bhi to kam se kam 15 20 by lead to aai hai aapke profile ke through.
Customer: Aaj aaj aaj to sir ek bhi nahi show kar rahi ha.
Executive: Nahi aaj main sold out dekh ke bata raha hu jo aai wo sold out ho gayi.
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Right jaise main aapko batata hu aaj jaise abhi 12 baj raha hai right to aapke total ek bari aap abhi online hai kya.
Customer: Ha sir online hai.
Executive: Ek bari aap past lead mein sir click karo past lead aap check karna.
Executive: Saat aath by lead aapki aai hui hai.
Executive: Dekh pa rahe ho aap.
Executive: Sir aapka is product hai marble Shiva Parvati statue iska size kitna hota hai 1 feet 2 feet 3 feet 4 feet kitna hota hai.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Awaz aa rahi hai sir aapke pass.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads on IndiaMART.

- Brass leads are showing instead of marble leads.



Resolution:

- Executive checked past leads, customer received 15-20 buyleads.

- Executive updated marble-related keywords in customer's profile.

- Executive advised customer to stay active on the platform.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to check past leads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, profile, keywords, marble, brass
